Schedule

Master of Ceremonies: Jen Cooper (Rice ’90)

Friday, January 31, 2025

1:00p Registration

2:00p Afternoon Session 1

2:00p Summit Welcome

2:15p Brian Greenwood and Tyler Richardett (American Soccer Analysis)
  “Building a Soccer Club’s Data Operation from the Ground Up”

2:40p Alejandro Dávila (Director of Analysis, Mazatlán FC)

3:05p Afternoon Break

3:35p Afternoon Session 2

Presented by SkillCorner
3:35p Introduction to the NWSL/WSL Research Breakaways

4:00p Kushal Gupta (Rice University & src | ftbl)

4:15p Interactive Round Table Discussions

5:00p Friday Content Concludes

5:30p Networking Reception: Women in Soccer Analytics

All Summit participants are welcome. RSVP is required by January 24.

Saturday, February 1, 2025

8:00a Breakfast and Registration

Enjoy breakfast tacos from Black Walnut Cafe and coffee/tea from Common Bond

9:00a Morning Sesssion 1

9:00a Saturday Welcome

Opening Industry Keynote
9:10a Ethan Creagar and Pat Onstad (Data Scientist and General Manager, Houston Dynamo FC)
  “Bridging Insights and Decisions in Soccer Operations”

9:50a NWSL/WSL Research Breakaway #1

10:00a Arielle Dror (Director of Data & Analytics, Bay FC)
  “Speedrunning an Analytics Department in 50 Days”

10:25a NWSL/WSL Research Breakaway #2

10:35a Morning Break

Enjoy and coffee and tea from Common Bond

11:05a Morning Session 2

Academic Keynote
11:05a Stefan Szymanski (Professor of Sport Management, University of Michigan)
  “Soccer Analytics: Science or Alchemy”

11:45a NWSL/WSL Research Breakaway #3

11:55a John Muller (Football writer, The Athletic, FiveThirtyEight, and more)
  “Numbers Talk — Now Make Them Tell a Story”

12:20p NWSL/WSL Research Breakaway #4

12:30p Lunch

Enjoy a selection of lunch options from Local Foods

1:30p Afternoon Session 1

1:30p Tianyu Guan (Assistant Professor of Statistics, York University)
  “Soccer Analytics Using Event Data and Tracking Data”

1:55p NWSL/WSL Research Breakaway #5

2:05p Weining Shen (Associate Professor of Statistics, UC Irvine)
  “Large Language Models in Sports Analytics”

2:30p NWSL/WSL Research Breakaway #6

2:40p Sachin Narayanan (Doctoral Candidate, Florida State University)
  “Beyond the Expected: Tailoring Analytics for Women’s Soccer”

3:05p Afternoon Break

Enjoy coffee, tea and pastries from Common Bond

3:35p Afternoon Session 2

3:35p NWSL/WSL Research Breakaway #7

3:45p Lydia Jackson (Machine Learning Engineer, Teamworks/Zelus)
  “Building Shiny Apps for Rapid Prototyping”

4:10p NWSL/WSL Research Breakaway #8

Closing Industry Keynote
4:20p Zayne M. Thomajan (General Manager, Chicago Fire FC)

5:00p Expected Own Goals Live Podcast

5:40p Summit Concludes
